import { IonButton, IonCheckbox, IonCol, IonContent, IonFooter, IonGrid, IonIcon, IonItem, IonItemOption, IonItemOptions, IonItemSliding, IonLabel, IonList, IonRow, IonText, IonTitle, IonToolbar } from '@ionic/react'; import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react'; import '../../css/Global.css'; import '../../css/CourseFilterPopoverContent.css'; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome'; import { faTimes } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import { chevronDownOutline, chevronUpOutline } from 'ionicons/icons'; const CourseFilterPopoverContent: React.FC<{ removeProg: any; removeAllProg: any; viewResults: any; params: any; href: any; }> = props => { const info = useRef(null); const showIcon = useRef(null); const displayInfoCol = () => { info.current!.hidden = !info.current!.hidden; if (showIcon.current!.icon == chevronDownOutline) showIcon.current!.icon = chevronUpOutline; else showIcon.current!.icon = chevronDownOutline; }; {/* Check if filter is checked */} const [checked, setChecked] = useState(false) return ( <>
